Introduction

LIMITLESS (Korean: 리미트리스; Japanese: リミットレス) is a 6-member boy group consisting of Vok (Also known as Jang Moonbok), A.M (now known as WOO), Raychan (now known as Hwichan), J-Jin, Heeseok, and C.I under ONO Entertainment. They debuted in July 2019 with their debut single "Dream Play".
